full_description:
Power Guard ECO-1825 10000mAh Mini DC UPS for Router

The Power Guard ECO-1825 Mini UPS is a versatile power source for WiFi routers, conventional routers, ONU/MCs, IP cameras, CC cameras, door locks, fingerprint scanners, mobile phones, and tablets. With an input voltage range of 100 to 240V AC and multiple output options, including USB, 9V/12V DC, and POE at 15V/24V DC, this WiFi router UPS is made to guarantee a continuous power supply for a variety of digital devices. It can be used for a wide range of applications, including door locks, IP cameras, WiFi routers, and traditional routers. The 10000mAh Power Guard ECO-1825 Mini router UPS With a large 10000mAh lithium battery, it can provide 4 to 8 hours of backup time, meaning it can run continuously even when there is a power outage. Protecting linked devices, the Power Guard ECO-1825 10000mAh Mini DC UPS has sophisticated circuitry with short circuit, overcharging, and overdischarge protection. The majority of digital goods on the market may be used with it due to its great compatibility, and the POE functionality makes wiring simpler by sending power. Furthermore, the USB output makes it easy to charge tablets, smartphones, and other electronic devices. Flexibility is increased by the Power Guard ECO-1825 10000mAh Mini DC Router UPS's integrated adaptor, which supports a broad range of AC voltages (85-265Vac). Users can rest easy knowing that the Power Guard ECO-1825 Mini DC UPS provides dependable and effective power backup solutions for a range of electronic equipment with features like LED indicators, a quick charge time of 2-3 hours, and a small design.

full_description:
Power Guard ECO-430-PRO 8000mAh Mini DC UPS for Router

The Power Guard ECO-430-PRO Mini UPS provides a dependable power backup solution for a wide range of devices, including routers, ONU, CC cameras, and mobile phones. It offers prolonged backup durations of 4 to 8 hours with its 8000mAh lithium iron phosphate battery, contingent upon the power usage of the connected devices. With a maximum output power of 30W and many output options, including 12V DC and 5V USB, the Power Guard ECO-430-PRO 8000mAh Mini Router UPS is compatible with a wide range of digital equipment. The Power Guard ECO-430-PRO 8000mAh Mini UPS has an innovative design that allows for configurable output voltages for USB, DC, and POE interfaces, providing a flexible means of powering various devices. With a normal charging period of two to three hours, the Power Guard Mini UPS has rapid charging capabilities that guarantee less downtime when recharging. It can adjust to various power sources by operating between 100 and 240 Vac in terms of input voltage and between 50 and 60 Hz in terms of frequency. The mini router UPS also has noise reduction technology, which ensures silent operation with a noise level of less than 40 dB. Because of its ability to combine efficiency, dependability, and versatility, the Power Guard ECO-430-PRO Mini Router UPS is a great option for providing steady power to a range of electronic devices in both home and business environments.
